name: The Wanted Merchant
description:
The Wanted Merchant is a game where you have to go around the map and unpacking your store and sell your juicy illegal Goods.

But....

be aware of Guard Patrols when they come you have to be fast pack your store, run and get away from their range.

Win the Game by selling all your Goods, and you'll lose if you leave your cart or if the Guards arrest you.

So what is your strategy and can you sell all you Goods?

In Store Mods:

UnPacking: Get items from the cart and lay them on the floor.
Selling: Allow people to buy from the Store.
Packing: Get Items from the floor to the cart.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to Move.
Left Shift or Right Shift to Zoom out the Map.
Space to Open/Close the Store
While in Store Space to cycle between mods.

How to Play:
